long_description: The Nite Ize Hardshell holster helps keep your iPhone(R) or similarly sized device protected from the elements and conveniently close at hand. Holster is made with durable ballistic nylon and high-density EVA foam; elastic side panels stretch to fit a variety of medium-size smartphones. Top flap with strong rip-and-stick closure helps shield your device from impacts and moisture. Internal pocket holds credit cards, ID, or cash. The Nite Ize Hardshell holster features a fixed-position clip that accommodates waistbands, belts and straps up to 2.125 in. wide.
short_description: The Nite Ize Hardshell holster helps keep your iPhone(R) or similarly sized device protected from the elements and conveniently close at hand.
